head.heading: Book spaces and equipment
head.text: In Varaamo you can book spaces and equipment for one-time use or make seasonal bookings to use a space regularly.

infoRecurring.heading: Recurring booking
infoRecurring.text: Apply for spaces or equipment for recurring use. You can browse spaces before the application period.

footer.heading: About Varaamo
footer.body:
Varaamo is an online service run by the City of Helsinki, where you can reserve spaces and workstations for your use.

The re-designed space booking service is in a pilot phase. New features and functionalities are being gradually introduced.
